direction.raw_text: (V.0.) Once upon a time, in deep winter, a Queen was admiring the falling snow when she saw a rose blooming in defiance of the cold. The rose looks miraculously red. Nearby, a RAVEN looks on. The Queen gazes at the flower, then bends down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) Reaching for it, she pricked her finger and three drops of blood fell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: with the impact of an artillery shell, a DROP OF BLOOD lands in the snow. Followed by ANOTHER. And ANOTHER. The Queen startles, then calmly touches her stomach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) And because the red seemed so alive against the white, she thought, if only I had a child as white as snow, lips as red as blood, hair as black as a raven's wings and all with the strength of that rose. A beat, then we hear the piercing cry of a new-born baby -- 2 INT. ROYAL BEDROOM - DAY. 2 We find ourselves in a crowded chamber full of MIDWIVES and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Moving through the chaos we glimpse buckets of water, dirty sponges, astrology charts and protection charms -- until we see a BABY GIRL in the arms of her happy mother.

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Soon after, a daughter was born to the Queen and was named "Snow White." With a radiant smile, the Queen offers SNOW WHITE to her proud father, KING MAGNUS. The baby's CRIES grow louder as the King cradles her gently in his arms, turning towards a mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And she was adored throughout the kingdom as much for her defiant spirit as for her beauty.

direction.raw_text: - A small songbird, it's chest open, revealing a small heart. Ravenna's claw plucks the tiny heart and we follow it to her mouth. She is dressed now and stands at a window, Finn at her side. OUTSIDE THE WINDOW - A CROWD OF STARVING PEASANTS at the foot of the castle, fight over the milk pouring from her bath. RAVENNA (TO HERSELF) I won't go back. She is lost for a moment, then...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Finn, do you remember when we were children, begging for scraps like those wretches?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, my Queen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Am I not kinder?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PRISON TOWER/ SNOW WHITE'S CELL - DAY. 32 Rose and Snow White converse...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All the girls in our village were taken. I was trying to reach safe haven at Duke Hammond's castle when I was caught -- Snow White bursts with hope -- SNOW WHITE The Duke?! He's alive?! He still fights in my father's name?! Rose stares at the feral girl now, realizing who she is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're the king's daughter? Princess?... The night the evil one's reign began we were told all in the castle were put to the sword. How were you spared?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: William? What about William?! The Duke's son?! Is he alive?! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 32 ROSE I don't know, princess. Rose shakes her head, still gazing at Snow White, then hears the distant cries of other female prisoners.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What will they do to me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THRONE ROOM - DAY 33 Ravenna sweeps into the great hall. The Generals and Finn snap to attention. She stops and stares at TWO MEN, the captured insurgents.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a grizzled old rebel, looks badly bruised and beaten, while his handsome son, LAIN, is unmarked. They both stare at her defiantly. Ravenna faces the two rebels. A SOLDIER steps forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My Queen, these two were captured leading an ambush of our supply caravan. Ravenna seems intrigued, steps forward, eyeing them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You left your home, your family, the bosom of my protection, to aid my enemies? Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because under your rule we have lost everything. We will not stop until this kingdom is free.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lost everything? (REGARDS IAIN) Your son? She moves to Iain, right up to his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very handsome. (TO THOMAS) Obviously a debt owed to your wife. She reaches out and touches Iain's strong jaw. He struggles against the Guards that hold him back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There was a time I would have lost my heart to a face like yours -- and you would have no doubt broken mine. In a flash Iain grabs a Guard's dagger and rams it into Ravenna's chest. She makes a pained face, looks down at the dagger, then up to Iain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You would kill your Queen? She pulls the dagger out - there is no"wound, no blood - and drops it on the ground. Iain and Thomas are shocked. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

result.heading: HIS HEART START TO HAMMER -- LOUDER AND LOUDER

direction.raw_text: : 33 RAVENNA (admiring; to Iain) You have beauty. And courage. But how strong is your heart? She smiles, almost regrettably, then places her hand on his chest. We hear HIS HEART START TO HAMMER -- LOUDER AND LOUDER. He grimaces in pain as she SQUEEZES -- the hammering filling his ears -- until his heart finally bursts and he drops dead. Thomas falls to his knees in horror, trying to revive his son. Finn draws his sword to behead him when Ravenna raises her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Let him return to the Duke and speak of the generosity of his Queen. With that she sweeps out, followed by Finn. It's only now that we see the lines on her face. Finn takes her by the arm as she falters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you alright? Ravenna pulls her arm away furiously. The General and the others stare, alarmed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: OUT!!!!! They quickly exit, all save Finn, who watches, concerned, as Ravenna leans against the wall for support. She pulls herself together, looks at Finn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Magic comes at a lofty price.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And the expense grows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You look...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: old?...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tired.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My powers... fade. This is about as much as Ravenna can confess. Finn watches as she walks up the stairs to the mirror chamber. Then he turns and CLAPS HIS HANDS TWICE. A GUARD appears and Finn nods. 20
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a INT. MIRROR CHAMBER - ROYAL PALACE 33a Ravenna walks into the room. Eyes the mirror, afraid to look at herself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) I have something for what ails you. She turns to see -- Finn, with Rose. Ravenna almost smiles. Rose holds her gaze defiantly. Ravenna walks over, admires her face, smiles, then takes her by the throat and -- LIFTS HER OFF HER FEET. Rose opens her mouth to scream but instead of sound, ENERGY pours out. Ravenna opens her mouth,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Like a flower blooming, her lines vanish. Like a flower wilting, Rose AGES until she's as old as the scullery maids.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PRISON TOWER/ SNOW WHITE'S CELL 34 Snow White hears approaching footsteps and watches as a Guard opens Greta's cell and tosses someone in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rose?... The Guard clangs the cell door shut and walks away. Snow White peers through the shadows. Can't quite make her out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rose?...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MIRROR CHAMBER - DAY. 35 RAVENNA stares into her mirror now, rejuvenated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mirror, mirror, on the wall, Who is the fairest of them all? The bronze ripples. The Mirror Man pours out and reforms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My Queen, you have defied nature and robbed it of its fairest fruit. But on this day there is one more beautiful than you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: More beautiful, but -- (CONTINUED) 20A
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She is the reason your powers wane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She won't live to see tomorrow. Who is it?! Give me her name?! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : (2) 35 MIRROR MAN Snow White. Ravenna is shocked by this, staggers a bit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Snow White? (CALLS OUT) Finn'.'. (back to mirror) I should have killed her as a child. She is my undoing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She is also your treasure, Queen. It was wise to have kept her close for the innocence and purity that can destroy can also heal. Hold her heart in your hands and you shall never again need to consume youth. You shall never again weaken or age. Immortality without cost! Ravenna laughs, overjoyed. Finn appears out of the shadows. All he sees is his sister laughing, giddily into her mirror, no sign of the mirror man, as if it exists only in her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, Queen?...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PRISON TOWER/ SNOW WHITE'S CELL - DAY. 38 Snow White paces in her cell, frantic. Two magpies appear in the window. She looks at them and watches as they flap their wings. Like they're trying to tell her something. She moves toward them. They jump back and up to the edge of the roof that is beside the cell window, hovering there. She is confused but notices -- A roofing nail, right where the Magpies hover. Snow White reaches a hand out the window and touches the loose nail. Her fingers move it back and forth as it, bit by bit, breaks free. She yanks hard.at the nail, almost has it when -- The Magpies flutter again and blast away, as if afraid -- (CONTINUED) 22
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Snow White hears FOOTSTEPS down the hall. She steadies herself, yanks once, twice and the nail comes loose. she jumps down, lies in her bed again just as -- Finn unlocks her door, leaving the key in the lock, and walks into the cell. He stands there until she turns her head slightly to him. She doesn't move, grips the nail in her closed hand as she tries to lure him closer with her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did I wake you? Snow White shakes her head gently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you always awake when I watch you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. She looks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've never come in before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My Queen won't allow it. She wants you all to herself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm afraid of her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not of me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. He can't help himself, reaches out and touches her arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's alright, princess. You will never again be locked in a cell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What does she want from me? His finger move from her hair to her cheek, stroking it gently, and then to her chest. With his free hand he reaches back for his dagger. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : (2) 38 FINN Your beating heart. Snow White grips the roofing nail even tighter as she looks at him. As he leans closer, she notices his off hand - the dagger and -- She SLASHES him across the face with the nail. Blood flies. Finn reacts, grabs his face in pain, yells and Snow White kicks him and runs for the door, locking it behind -- 23 39 INT. GRETA'S CELL/ TOWER STEPS - DAY. 39 Snow White hurtles down the steps to Greta's cell. She is shocked by what she sees. Rose, now an old woman, looks to her. Snow White fumbles with the keys. Rose holds out both her hands. Snow White takes them, looks into her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go. Finn stumbles to the cell door, clutching his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Snow White tosses the keys into an empty cell and races away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CORRIDOR/ CASTLE - DAY. 40 Snow White runs down the steps into a corridor and sees ARMED GUARDS appear at the other end. She hurries into another tower, bolting the door shut behind her, and charges down the steps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . COURTYARD/ CASTLE - DAY. 41 SNOW WHITE BURSTS OUTSIDE -- into the light. She almost hyperventilates at all the air, the sky. Then she runs through the courtyard toward the portcullis. The magpies fly right into her face then away, telling her to follow. She does and heads straight for the small opening at the base of the castle wall - the entrance to the SEWERS. As the magpies rise, she slides on one hip, plunging into the darkness below. The guards follow but can't squeeze through the opening, running towards the Portcullis instead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SEWER - DAY. 42 Snow White splashes through the deep stinking sludge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PORTCULLIS - DAY. 43 The old rebel, Thomas, with his son's body draped over a mule, looks back curiously as he hears the guards yelling -- CHIEF GUARD 0/S Open the gates! The Princess has escaped! He stares in surprise as riders gallop out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SEA - OUTSIDE CASTLE - DAY. 44 Snow White is swept out of the sewers into the sea. Seaweed wraps itself around her limbs, pulling her deeper.into the depths, but she kicks and fights her way back to the surface -- gasping for air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEACH -- OUTSIDE CASTLE - DAY. 45 Snow White swims ashore. She looks up and sees a maze of large rocks stretching out. She sets off in one direction when the two
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: reappear, urging her to follow them in another direction. She scrambles after them and sees a WHITE MARE waiting for her on the beach, lying on its side, allowing her to climb on. The mare raises itself and is away in a flash.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BEACH - DAY. 46 Galloping hooves skim the surf, RIDERS pursuing Snow White.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DECIMATED VILLAGE - DAY. 47 Snow White rides towards the village -- only it's unrecognizable now -- most of the cottages have been razed to the ground or boarded up. A group of people including children - skeletal, hungry, desperate - see her approach and move out to greet her. She stops her horse for a moment, gazing past tears at the devastation and the state of villagers all around her. At first their approach seems harmless but as they get closer their faces reveal dangerous desperation and -- She gallops off, looking back to see the Queen's men giving chase.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: FIELDS AND WOODLAND BEYOND THE VILLAGE

direction.raw_text: . FIELDS AND WOODLAND BEYOND THE VILLAGE - DAY. 48 The fields and woods are even more devastated than the village. Farmland has been burnt to cinders and trees chopped down. All around Snow White the world is stubble and ash.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: -- THE DARK FOREST -- A VAST WALL OF PRIMORDIAL TREES
MISTY BOGS/ ENTRANCE TO THE DARK FOREST

direction.raw_text: . ENDLESS MOOR - AERIAL SHOT - DAY. 49 Snow White crests a hill, her mare rearing as she sees -- THE DARK FOREST -- A VAST WALL OF PRIMORDIAL TREES. A mist seeps from the forest like an evil miasma. Snow white hesitates -- then sees the riders closing in and urges her mare on -- 50 EXT. MISTY BOGS/ ENTRANCE TO THE DARK FOREST - DAY. 50 Shadows everywhere. The mare charges into the misty bog then suddenly loses her footing. She rears -- throwing Snow White onto the safety of solid ground. Snow White tries to grab her reins but the horse pulls away, not wanting to endanger her life. She tries again but the horse backs farther away from her. Slowly they're separated by the swirling fog -- As Snow White sees the silhouettes of the riders reappear. Reluctantly she turns and runs into the forest -- (CONTINUED) 25
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The riders are about to follow when their horses rear and kick in terror. One guard is thrown off and sucked down in the bog, frightening off the others. Despite their concern for Snow White, the MAGPIES are also too afraid to enter the forest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DARK FOREST - DAY. 51 Snow White hurtles through the trees, a ghostly fog rising up all around her, then trips over a root, landing face first in -- A patch of LARGE MUSHROOMS that unleash CLOUDS OF POLLEN. She coughs, trying to fan the pollen away, but it's too late. She hurries on, but the hallucinations come thick and fast now -- The trees look almost human, hooded figures peering at her through the haze. She sees owls without eyes. Black oil oozing out of tree trunks. A hanging vine reaches down and touches her like a hand and now she runs -- More terrors rage at her from the swirling mist. She stumbles again and when she looks up vampire bats scream at her from the trees. Huge skeletal forms crack out of the bark, descending on her until she finally passes out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . AERIAL VIEW OF DARK FOREST -- DAY.(D4N) 52 From high above, we see the unconscious Snow White as mist whirls in a circle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a EXT. CASTLE BEACH - NIGHT.(D4N) 52a Vicious waves crash into rocks. Nature's anger on display.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MIRROR CHAMBER - NIGHT. 53 From above we see Ravenna striding furiously in a circle of her own. She is livid, a whirling dervish. She's fairly spitting as she barks at Finn, who stands in the middle of the room, his face bleeding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How is it an innocent young girl makes a fool of my brother?! Armed only with a nail?! If she'd had a sword she'd have taken the whole castle! We're in front of her, behind her, on her face, on her feet -- She picks up the pace as well as the volume -- RAVENNA You swore to protect me! Do you not understand what, the girl means to us?! This is my future! This is everything. Everything! (MORE)az (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 53 RAVENNA (CONT'D) There is no one I can trust in this place!! There is no loyalty! None!!!! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : (2) 53 And then she stops on a dime, turns to him, marches right up to Finn and -- BELTS HIM! Hard. He staggers a bit then picks himself up, looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She was chased into the dark forest. She's likely already dead. She SCREAMS and slaps him viciously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's no good to me there, lost. I must have her heart! You have failed me! Finn's had enough, he erupts at her -- FINN Have I not given all to you?! She takes this, softens, unexpectedly, and almost smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have I not given you all? All. She raises her finger and touches his face. His wound heals instantly and his face grows calm. He nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Indeed, my Queen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't fail me again, Finn. (BEAT) I have no powers in the Dark Forest. Bring me someone who knows it well. Someone who can hunt her!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a OMITTED 53a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . VILLAGE - DAY. 54 Finn speaks to a group of people assembled by his men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Queen demands the services of someone to navigate the Dark Forest. The villagers stay mum, shaking their heads. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 54 OLD LADY No-one goes into the Dark Forest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You will be compensated. Still no takers. An OLD-TIMER stares right at FINN, steps forwards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's one man. A widower.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where might I find him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the Inn. Drinking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . They turn to see -- Eric flies through the Inn's wall and lands in a heap on the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Appears he's finished.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INN - SAME - DAY. 55 Eric. Drunk. He tries to focus as Broch strides through the same hole and stands over him. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 55 BROCH You owe me money from my pocket and money for the girl!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have it right here in my pocket. If you'll just help me up. Eric holds his hand out. Broch walks over, suspicious. When he's close, Eric grabs his arm and kicks with both feet in Broch's chest. Broch flies back, then strides to Eric and kicks him in the side. Hurts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want my money!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Actually, I seem to have drunk it all. You're welcome to it when it comes out again. Broch hauls him back up to his feet. He takes a swing but somehow the drunken Eric dodges the blow, swinging back at him. Everyone has come out of the Inn to enjoy the fight. Eric lands a body blow to Broch, who doubles over. Eric comes in for the kill, winds up and swings - Missing Broch but hitting a HORSE on the ass. It kicks its legs, sending him flying. He lands in a heap and drops his head back. Hands lift him and -- Drop him in a horse trough. He's underwater for a few seconds before he comes to and lifts out his head, eyes still closed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perfume? He opens his eyes to see Finn gazing down at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Royalty. That explains it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Queen demands your presence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can't you see I'm having a bath?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THRONE ROOM - CASTLE - DAY. 58 RAVENS perch on the ledges and LURCHERS scamper about. Eric, still drunk, filthy, damp clothes, face bruised, enters the room, eyes the ravens, then looks at -- Ravenna on her throne. She watches him curiously. He's more interested in the aged scullery maids, including Rose, who are staring at him accusingly. He has no idea who they are or what he's done wrong. Finally he comes before the Queen, sizing her up like a tavern beauty. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 58 RAVENNA My brother tells me you are a widower, a drunkard and one of few who has ventured into the dark forest. Finn looks on, standing nearby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One of my prisoners has escaped there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then he's dead -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She. She shoots Finn a pointed look then looks back at Eric.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then she is certainly dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Find her. Bring her to me. Eric holds her gaze, uneasy at the request.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've been to the Dark Forest enough times to know I'm not going back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You will be rewarded handsomely.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Coin's no good to me if I'm lying dead with crows picking at my eyes. Ravenna steps off her throne now, approaching him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There may be more than gold in the offing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why is her life of such value?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That is none of your concern.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll determine what concerns me, thank you. She smiles, moves even closer to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You will do this for me, Huntsman. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : (2) 58 ERIC And if I refuse? Ravenna nods to the Guards, who pull their swords. Dying to cut him to pieces. Eric eyes them, then looks to her and, in complete honesty -- (CONTINUED) 29
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do me the favor. I beg of you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you wish to be reunited with your beloved? Eric reacts instinctively, grabbing her by the throat. The courtiers rise to their feet and the guards draw their swords, but Ravenna holds up her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My wife is none of your concern. Something about her face, the fact that she enjoys his hand on her throat makes Eric queasy. He releases his grip, stares right at Ravenna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My condolences. Ravenna holds his gaze.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You miss her? His eyes say, yes, he misses her horribly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What would you give to bring her back? Eric stares at her curiously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know of my powers. Bring me the girl and I will bring back your wife.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing will bring her back. Ravenna moves even closer, looks him right in the eye. She is incredibly persuasive as she says -- RAVENNA I can. Believe me, huntsman. Eric's eyes say he wants to believe. Needs to believe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A life for a life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MOORS/ OUTSIDE DARK FOREST - DAY. 59 Mist drifts across the moors, the primordial trees looming up ahead. Finn and Eric ride side by side, FOUR GUARDS following. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 59 FINN You fought in the west? Against the armies of the five kings? Eric nods without looking at him, gazing at the forest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You must have seen a great deal of death?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Death is everywhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come now, you're being modest. There is a difference between gutting a deer and gutting a man. How many did you kill?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not something I counted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (with a smile) Nor I. But I recall every face. There is no greater delight than battle. Eric finds this unseemly, but prefers not to engage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come now, huntsman, what do you feel when you watch a man die? Delight? Invincibility?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorrow. This takes Finn aback, not an answer he was expecting. After a beat...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And what of them? At the tip of your sword. What do they feel? I'd enjoy knowing. Eric looks at him, realizing from Finn's face that it is an honest question. -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The.only difference between you and I is I'-never found a wife to save my soul.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Too bad. You'll need one. He stops his horse and nods. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : (2) 59 They are all stopped at the entrance to the Dark Forest fifty meters ahead. The Guards gulp back their fears. Finn tries to hide his own. Even the horses sense danger and start to whinny and back up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DARK FOREST - DAY. 60 Vines and roots have grown over Snow White's body, as if the forest is trying to devour her. She opens her eyes, sees her wrists and ankles bound and reacts in horror, struggling to free herself of her bonds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: until we can see the full scope of the Dark Forest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BOGS/ DARK FOREST - DAY. 61 Eric and Finn have tethered their nervous horses and stand at the entrance to the bog.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do exactly as I do. Eric carefully places one foot after the next on grassy stepping stones that disappear into the bog as soon as his full weight is on them. The others catch on and follow, stepping on stones of their own. Once they're across the bog and onto dry land Finn takes a step forward but Eric grabs his arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Exactly as I do. Eric puts a cloth to his face, gesturing for Finn and his guards to do the same and moves forward through the mushroom field - pops of pollen misting all around them. Eric stops, bends down, spotting faint FOOTPRINTS in the dew. He walks faster now, Finn watching in admiration.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .TREES/ DARK FOREST - DAY. 64 Snow White finally shakes free of the vines, jumps up and senses she's being followed. She looks up at the trees but all she sees are vague shadows. The wind picks up, ghostly voices howling in the breeze. She's rooted to the spot for a moment, then loses her nerve and runs -- 64aEXT. DARK FOREST - DAY. 64a Eric, Finn and the Guards move through a dark copse of trees.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: WHISPERS-call to them from the wind. Eric stops, looks around. (CONTINUED) 32
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a CONTINUED: 64a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pay them no mind. One of the Guards leans over a pool of water to drink when he sees a GHOSTLY REFLECTION gazing back at him. He stares in surprise, leaning closer. Suddenly a BARBED TAIL shoots out of the water -- skewering him -- and drags him into the depths. The others turn as they hear a scream but there's no sign of their companion now, just the bubbling water. Only Finn looks unconcerned. Eric stops senses something, holds up a hand. Then darts ahead, leaving them flat-footed. Finn makes a decision to follow and waves for his Guards to go ahead of him. They reluctantly follow Eric.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DARK FOREST - MOMENTS LATER - DAY. 65 Eric moves quickly then stops, listens - we see his hunting skills - as he hears the noise of cracking branches in the distance, he blasts away, moving like lightning.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: SUDDENLY STRONG HANDS GRAB HER BY THE FEET AND DRAG HER OUT OF THE BUSHES

direction.raw_text: . TREES/ DARK FOREST - DAY. 66 Snow White feels like the whole forest is pursuing her. Running out of breath, she hides in some bushes. As she stares into the mist, she sees a sinister figure appear through the haze. Eric stops and looks around, sensing his prey is close. Snow White stays low, trying to quieten her breathing. Eric studies the forest floor. He sees Snow White's footprints, then looks up at an area of disturbed undergrowth. Snow White peers through the bushes and sees the huntsman's boots approaching. She looks around for something to defend herself with when the sound of the footsteps fades. She can't see anyone now. She looks relieved when SUDDENLY STRONG HANDS GRAB HER BY THE FEET AND DRAG HER OUT OF THE BUSHES. She fights to get away but he pins her with a foot, reaches down and turns her over. His first look at her gives him pause. Her face, her spirit, her youth. She slaps at him - he pulls out his knife with one hand while he pins her with the other. Then grabs, lifts her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me go! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 66 She bites him. He grimaces and grabs her tighter and starts trudging back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's going to kill me! The Oueen! He ignores, keeps moving.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure she is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Believe me! Her brother tried to cut out my heart. He stops, looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I swear it. He somehow believes her. New game. Then... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : (2) 66 FINN (O.S.) Quick work! Eric looks up to see Finn and his men approaching. Snow White gasps at the sight of Finn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Him! He's the one! He came at me with a knife! Eric holds her tight, one arm around her neck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well done, huntsman. Hand her over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't trust him!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you intend to do with her?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why do you care? Finn nods and the Guards approach. Eric grips her tighter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want her. Give me what I was promised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come now huntsman, you did your job well. Keep your word and hand her over. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : (3) 66 SNOW WHITE He'll betray you -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut up! -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He'll kill us both -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said, shut up! He puts his knife to her throat to quiet her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll keep my word when the Queen keeps hers. Finn shakes his head and laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are a drunk and a fool. My Queen has many powers; she can take life or sustain it. But she can't bring your wife back from the dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! His face tells us how much Eric wanted, needed to believe. The Guards keep inching toward Eric. Eric, still with a knife to Snow White's throat, starts slowly backing up. Finn pulls his own sword and approaches. Four against one. As they burst toward him he tosses Snow White to the ground and in the same motion throws his knife into the chest of one of the Guards, who crumbles. Eric reaches behind, grabs both hatchets and faces off with the others. They all rush at once. Eric fights off the guards as he raises a hatchet, throws it -- Right into Finn's chest. Just like Ravenna, no blood, no wound. Finn pulls it out, laughs and throws it at the huntsman who ducks as it sticks into a tree. Snow White, terrified, races off into the forest. They notice her exit but keep fighting. Eric fights on three sides now - holding his own until Finn manages to plunge a sword in his side. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : (4) 66 Eric grunts and falls back. Finn races forward to finish him off but Eric lunges and -- Flips Finn onto his back and into a grove of mushrooms. Eric covers his nose with his arm and looks at the other Guards, who look from Finn, who is dazed, to Eric, who is hurt. Finn struggles to his knees, shakes his head, hallucinating a bit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Butcher him! Find her! The Guards, also trying to cover their noses, move forward. Eric has a decision to make. Bad odds. And he's injured. Eric decides in an instant, grabs his knife out of the dead Guard, as well as his hatchet from the tree and runs after Snow White -- 67 EXT. DARK FOREST - DAY. 67 Snow White crashes through the woods. Then a HAND grabs her shoulder-- Eric. He slaps a palm over her mouth before she can scream and slides down a steep slope into undergrowth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a EXT. DARK FOREST - FINN - SAME 67a Finn is on his feet but still hallucinating - stumbling about. The Guards are spooked as they look all around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is not finished! The words echo through the dark forest.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: PUNCHES HIM WITH ALL SHE'S GOT

direction.raw_text: b EXT. DARK FOREST - ERIC AND SNOW WHITE - SAME 67b Eric removes his hand from Snow White's mouth. At once she PUNCHES HIM WITH ALL SHE'S GOT. He steps back, licks his bloody lip. She takes another swing. This one he manages to grab.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get your hands off me. She draws his dagger. He backs off. Eyeball to eyeball: (CONTINUED) 36
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: b CONTINUED: 67b
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who are you? What the hell's going on?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get away from me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why does the Queen want you dead?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She wants us all dead. All of us-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then what makes you so damn valuable?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You should know. You're the one hunting me. He backs away. Paces. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 67b CONTINUED: (2) 67b
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never get involved in the Queen's business and what do I do? Get involved in the Queen's business... Without warning, he walks off. Leaving her alone. She follows him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are you going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Away from you, love. You're trouble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need to get to the Duke's Castle. There's an army there. I'll be safe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Duke? I've seen sheep with more fight in them. Desperate, she takes a chance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take me, you'll be rewarded. I'm valuable. Isn't that why you're here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're dead if you return without me. And I'm dead if you leave me. He turns, exasperated with her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Then -- wearily:) Just for argument's sake. (Shakes his head) How much?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How much is enough? Eric "reluctantly" prices up the job.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well,it's a long way, through the forest, and that... that's a dangerous road, I couldn't even consider it for less than thirty gold pieces...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A hundred. Deliver me safe to the Duke. I give you my word. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 67b CONTINUED: (3) 67b Deep quandary. Still suspicious..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who are you? She looks at him levelly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe that's a question you should have asked the queen. Stand-off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do we have a deal?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't trust you Billy Goat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've given you my word. He spits on his hand. She puts out her hand. He shakes it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I still don't trust you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't trust you either. She wipes it on her skirt. Behind them, a commotion. They run off. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : (4) 67B 67c OMITTED 67c
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 68a EXT. DARK FOREST - DAY. 68a Tree roots gleam with an eerie phosphorescent light. The mist closes in. Snow White looks around the forest, unnerved by the haunting silence and the deep shadows. Reluctantly she focuses on Eric, trying to take her mind off the terrors around her. He sits on a log for a breath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll stay the night here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You haven't answered me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't recall a question.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are we going? He takes a stick, draws in the dirt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Queen. Mountains. Dark Forest. Here. Past. There's a village. She takes the stick, points to a different spot in the dirt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to the Duke's Castle. He grabs the stick back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll go where I take you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll take me to the Duke's castle or I'll go alone. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 68a CONTINUED: 68a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (beat; looks around) As soon as you get me out of the forest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're rather demanding, and not all that endearing, you know? (CONTINUED) 38
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a CONTINUED: (2) 68a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a reward that awaits you. There are noblemen there, an army.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An army? The Duke fights? He hides behind walls. I know sheep that have more fight in them. (after a beat) How much? (off her look) Reward? Just for argument's sake?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How much do you want? Eric considers this, not sure how or if to negotiate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two hundred gold pieces. Do we have a deal? More, a lot more, than he was expecting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll deliver you to safety m' lady.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Swear it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I swear (beat). Constantly. It's one of my better qualities. She's not sure what to make of this, but...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine. He moves to a spot to lie down and gathers leaves. Snow White seeks her own spot and comes upon -- the RIB CAGE OF A DEAD DEER, a host of BEAUTIFUL BUTTERFLIES feeding on its bones. She is shocked. Eric notices...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've seen far stranger things in here. She sits, looks to Eric. Something's been bothering her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you think... will they follow us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They'd be foolish to. Few survive. Good news/bad news. She looks around. (CONTINUED) 39
direction.name: direction

result.heading: RIB CAGE OF A DEAD DEER,

direction.raw_text: a CONTINUED: (3) 68a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How far have you travelled into the Dark Forest?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We passed it a few miles back. He opens his flask and takes a healthy pull.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DUKE HAMMOND'S STRONGHOLD - AERIAL SHOT - DAY. 69 We're moving over high mountains and valleys now, approaching Duke Hammond's castle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . WAR ROOM/ DUKE HAMMOND'S CASTLE - DAY. 70 Grim faced COMMANDERS look on as DUKE HAMMOND comforts a sobbing man in the firelight. We recognise the old rebel,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: whose son was killed by Ravenna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She killed brave Lain with only her palm and pulled a dagger from her chest without blood. She cannot be killed. Duke Hammond has heard enough, turns to leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is more. (DUKE STOPS) The princess has escaped the castle!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where is my son?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FIELD - DAY. 71 FLAMING MOSS is thrown into a puddle of oil and a MASSIVE FIRE lights up the night. William, rapid-fires his bow at close quarters into a line of the Queen's supply wagons and the fight is on. A VIOLENT CLASH OF SWORDS IN CLOSE QUARTER FIGHTING. His COMPANIONS are as wild and hot-headed as he is, roaring with delight as the Queen's men finally flee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 73a INT. WAR ROOM/ DUKE HAMMOND'S CASTLE - NIGHT. 73a William enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You asked for me, father? (CONTINUED) 40
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a CONTINUED: 73a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have news of the Princess. William stares in surprise -- WILLIAM The Princess?!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ravenna has kept her all these years.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She lives?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She escaped the castle and into the dark
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He turns to leave -- WILLIAM I'm going after her!.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We don't know if she survived -- Duke Hammond grabs him by the arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You ventured beyond the walls tonight, disobeying my orders. We are all that's left, William. I cannot afford to lose any more of my men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then I will go alone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I cannot afford to lose my only heir! You do not know the dark forest!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then I'll find someone who does. William pulls away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will not abandon her a second time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PLAINS BEYOND DUKE HAMMOND'S STRONGHOLD - DAWN. 74 William gallops away from the castle walls under the cover of the breaking dawn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 68a 75 41 76 OMITTED 76 77 OMITTED 77 78 EXT. STABLES/ INN/ VILLAGE - DAY 78 A motley crew of woodsmen stand side to side. Finn is eyeing them, sizing them up, picking a crew.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Which of you knows the dark forest? A powerfully built Yakut tracker, ALDAN, and BROCH both nod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You. You. You. You. He's selected Aldan, Broch and points to others. As we move down the line we see -- William, hat low, trying to look tough. Finn selects a few more.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Load and prepare. You ride for bounty. Into the dark forest. The rest of you. Away ! As they disperse.. William sets his jaw, and heads off..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The men ride out of the village. Suddenly they stop. Standing up ahead is William, blocking their path. He calls to them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You need a bowman?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: calls back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have a bowman. Away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stands unblinking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said away, damn you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: doesn't move. Finn turns to the bowman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kill him. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction
