direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: he can loose an arrow:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! THWACK!! Two arrows strike the bowman in the throat, lifting him off his horse, stone dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: turns. WILLIAM lowers his bow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said do you need a bowman? Finn studies William with dead eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: aEXT. VILLAGE ROAD - DAY. 80a In the pouring rain, a group of fierce BOUNTY HUNTERS ride on horseback, when another rider appears, blocking their way. It's William. (CONTINUED) 43
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a CONTINUED: 80a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Clear the road. But William doesn't budge. One of the other mercenaries grins, then rides towards William, drawing his sword. He raises it when William unslings his bow and loosens two arrows at close range, hitting him in each thigh and knocking him off his horse. Broch draws his enormous battle axe, about to charge, when Finn rides forward and stops him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait! Finn sizes up William.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're quick with a bow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to ride with you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are paying well and I need the coin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you traversed the Dark Forest?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then what use are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As you said, I'm quick with a bow. He nods to the guy on the ground, groaning with arrows in his thighs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And unlike him, I have two good legs. Finn considers for a moment, then smiles, nods to the guy on the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Replace him. William looks at Finn gratefully. Finn studies him with a curious smile then rides on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . AERIAL VIEW/ DARK FOREST - DAY. 81 From high above, we see the dark forest stretching out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 83a EXT. DARK FOREST - DAY 83a Snow White approaches a stream, kneels, splashes her face and brings a handful of water to her lips.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wouldn't do that if I were you. Not unless you want your bowels to rip apart. She turns. Eric has been snoozing on a rock, with one eye open. She releases the water, stands and faces off with Eric, who offers his flask of mead. She reluctantly takes a sip, spits most of it out, hands it back. He smells something, walks a few steps, bends down and examines a long brown pellet shaped object on the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A fumee. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 83a CONTINUED: 83a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want me to call it by another name? He doesn't need to. It's an animal dropping. Snow White winces as he kneads it between his fingers and takes a long sniff. (CONTINUED) 45
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a CONTINUED: (2) 83a She catches the look of fear in his eyes as he gazes around the woods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay here. He moves away, though the trees, tracking prey. He hears the wind call his name...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eric. He stops, looks to -- An outcropping of rocks, surrounded by dense forest. From out behind a tree steps an apparition of SARA. She's beautiful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sara?...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She hears him call out and follows his tracks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sara holds out her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Am I dreaming?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Touch me and see for yourself. Eric shakes his head, looks around, tries to fight it, but... Her face draws him back and he begins to walk toward the rocks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You weren't there to save me, Eric. I called for you but you never came. Snow White appears behind and sees -- Eric is walking toward a dark area where several sets of lupine eyes await. But Eric only sees Sara and he continues to move toward her. She opens her arms to him and steps backwards, luring him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where were you, Eric? Come to me now. Protect me now. (CONTINUED) 46
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a CONTINUED: (3) 83a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sara, I'm so sorry. Forgive me, please forgive me. Give me peace. Sara... He takes another step toward her and -- Buckles - THWACK! Snow White hits him behind his knees with a piece of wood. He hits the ground and she drags him away. He fights back and she jumps on top of him, staring right into his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's not real! Not real! Do you hear me?! He does and calms. She gets off him and he sits up, fatigued by the experience. A low point for him. He reaches for his flask -- pours the last single drop into his mouth. All gone. He tosses it aside. A lost soul. Snow White watches him with some compassion. He catches her look, gets up and walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: b EXT. DARK FOREST OPEN AREA - DAY 83b Snow White catches up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who is she? The one you bargained for. The one that spoke to you. Who is Sara?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A name you'll not mention again. He tosses a knife to her. She's surprised but catches it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Feel its weight. One hand to the other. She shakes her head but does so.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now hold it - business end pointed at me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why are you?-- He lunges at her and she raises the blade.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Which is your lead foot? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 83b CONTINUED: 83b
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean? (CONTINUED) 47
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: b CONTINUED: (2) 83b He jumps at her again and she puts her right foot forward, knife in right hand pointed. He starts to slowly move toward her. One step at a time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now stay back. You're too small to attack. You have to parry; use your opponents strength against him. Raise your opposing forearm. She does. He comes closer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With it you block and deflect an opposing thrust. You'll lose meat but you won't die from it. Wait until I'm close. He steps forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not yet. Watch my hands, not my eyes. He moves even closer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not yet. Not until you can feel my breath. He moves right up to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now. Their faces are inches apart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This close. Drive it through me. To the hilt. Now look in my eyes. (SHE DOES) Don't pull it out 'til you see my soul. Their eyes are still locked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why do I need to learn how to kill? He looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a lot you need to learn lass. Eric backs away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep that. She nods, now-focused on him in a way other than as an instructor. He turns and walks away. (CONTINUED) 48
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: b CONTINUED: (3) 83b
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are you going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fumee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CLOISTER GARDENS/ CASTLE - DAY. 84C A single blossom flowers on the dying apple tree. Ravenna, looking weaker than before, stares at it quietly, as if she were gazing at Snow White. She reaches out and crushes the blossom in her hand, turning it into ash. Her look is one of conviction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Find her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DARK FOREST - DAY. 87 Finn reacts as if he heard Ravenna's words. He did. They have that kind of connection. Spooked, he continues on. The other trackers follow, William looking tense. At the back of the group, one of the mercenaries slows down, sensing something in the forest. William is still watching Finn when they hear a bloodcurdling
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: behind them. The mercenary's horse gallops out of the trees without its rider, a gaping wound in its side. William and the others look shaken but Finn doesn't even turn around, riding on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a EXT. DARK FOREST - DAY. 87a Eric pulls Snow White along. Beyond a bridge we see open fens
direction.name: direction

result.heading: LEADS OUT OF THE DARK FOREST --

direction.raw_text: the bridge LEADS OUT OF THE DARK FOREST -- and birds circling on the distant horizon. Snow White looks relieved as she follows him down a slope. They hurry through a sea of mist when suddenly Eric stops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It can't be this easy. He quietly unsheathes a hatchet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is this the end of the Dark Forest?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (not paying attention) Uh-huh. (CONTINUED) 49
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a CONTINUED: 87a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How far to the Duke's castle? He ignores, follows tracks, then stops as he sees the STONE BRIDGE below -- LEADING OUT OF THE DARK FOREST. Snow White stares at it too, relieved. Beyond the bridge there are open fens. They hurry down together and start to cross the bridge. They're half way across WHEN SUDDENLY WE SEE THE STONES START TO MOVE BEHIND THEM -- A PAIR OF EYES OPENS IN THE STONE, AND SLOWLY THE BRIDGE STARTS TO RISE -- Snow White turns to see -- A HUGE CREATURE REARING UP -- TWENTY FEET TALL. IT'S NOT A BRIDGE AT ALL BUT A -- ERIC Troll! Eric and Snow White are SLAMMED off the bridge and land in the shallow creek below -- among the CARCASSES OF SLAIN ANIMALS. The troll roars and comes after them, swinging its giant stone fists. Eric grabs Snow White and runs -- As the troll catches up with them, Eric shoves her out of the way and draws his hatchets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Run! Snow White turns and flees. Eric runs at the Troll. He ducks as a mighty arm sweeps over him, darts between the troll's legs, and hacks at its leg with his hatchets. The Troll falters a bit then -- A swinging stone fist catches him and hurls him across the creek. Snow White looks back to see Eric lying stunned on the ground, his wound bleeding again, at the troll's mercy. She hesitates, still terrified, then runs back. The Troll towers over the huntsman. It raises its stone hands to crush him when -- Snow White arrives -- SCREAMING LIKE A BANSHEE! The Troll looks around in surprise. So does Eric. A beat, then the monster turns away from Eric, striding towards Snow
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She stands her ground, fighting her terror, PULLS HER KNIFE. The TROLL looms over her, but she doesn't retreat. She raises an arm, just as Eric instructed. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

result.heading: -- LEADING OUT OF THE DARK FOREST
WHEN SUDDENLY WE SEE THE STONES START TO MOVE BEHIND THEM -- A PAIR OF EYES OPENS IN THE STONE, AND SLOWLY THE BRIDGE STARTS TO RISE --
-- A HUGE CREATURE REARING UP -- TWENTY FEET TALL
IT'S NOT A BRIDGE AT ALL BUT A -- ERIC

direction.raw_text: 87a CONTINUED: (2) 87a Eric stares in surprise, watching the twenty foot monster towering over the tiny girl. (CONTINUED) 50
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a CONTINUED: (3) 87a Snow White stares into the troll's eyes, seeing something almost gentle in its monstrous gaze, slowly losing her fear. The troll stares at her too, confused, then slowly pacified, until it finally turns and strides away. Eric stares in disbelief. Snow White is rooted to the spot, also confused but strangely moved by what's happened. Eric rises to his feet painfully and heads over, taking her by the arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told you to run.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I had you'd be dead. A "thank you" would suffice. It's clear he sees her in a different light. She stares back at him. Eric holds her gaze, struggling a bit, then...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: A FIGURE IN A HOODED CLOAK, (ANNA)

direction.raw_text: . MARSHES - DAY. 88 The sun glints through the thinning trees. Eric wades through the deep sludge, Snow White following in his steps. Eric looks at her a moment, then suddenly turns away as he sees her expression change -- GHOSTLY BACKLIT FIGURES EMERGE on the banks of the marsh now, holding bows and arrows. Eric looks around for an escape route, but everywhere he turns MORE FIGURES APPEAR. He draws his axe when A FIGURE IN A HOODED CLOAK (ANNA) appears, clutching her bow like a goddess.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They say only demons or spirits can survive the dark forest. Which are you? Eric, unsure, pulls his hatchet and steps in front of Snow White protecting her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Which are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Neither. Perhaps you are the Queen's spies?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're fugitives from the Queen. Snow White steps forward into the light. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : B8 SNOW WHITE We mean you no harm. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : (2) 88 Anna sees Snow White clearly now, raises her hood. Snow White sees a deep scar running down her otherwise beautiful face. And then a smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FENLAND VILLAGE - DAY 89 The fenland village is made up of mud huts, elevated on stilts to protect them from flooding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are the men? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 89 ANNA Gone. Anna paddles a boat as they approach the village. Eric and Snow White speak quietly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The boat stops and they get out. The women of the village move from their hut to greet them as they walk into the village. More women emerge from their huts to view the newcomers, no men in sight. They all have scarred faces. All the women have assembled alongside the group, watching with awe as they pass. They stare at Snow White and murmur. They can't take their eyes off her. Some even reach out to touch her sleeve or dress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sotto; to Eric) Why are they looking at me like that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know, but keep smiling. A beautiful LITTLE GIRL, LILY, moves away from her friends and offers her hand. Snow White stops, looks down at the girl, trying not to stare at her scar. 90-93a OMITTED 90-93a
direction.name: direction

location: BANKS OF THE LAKE/ FENLAND VILLAGE
result.heading: EXT.

direction.raw_text: b EXT. BANKS OF THE LAKE/ FENLAND VILLAGE - DAY. 93b Eric sits by the lake, ANNA bandaging his wounds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have travelled far Huntsman. With a heavy burden. Snow white is playing with Lily. They are making little dolls from straw.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've had worse jobs. And anyway, she's not that heavy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean... you do not know who she is? His eyes narrow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean? He looks over. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: aA
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: b CONTINUED: 93b
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who is she?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Snow White draws eyes upon the doll. Snow White's eyes fill with tears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My father showed me how to make them. But he's gone away. Lily takes a stick and marks the dolls face with a scar..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here. She's finished. She hands it to her. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 93b CONTINUED: (2) 93b
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's beautiful. Lily smiles and runs off to play. Behind her Eric appears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These women... This place.. It's very peaceful. But it makes me very sad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why didn't you tell me? She stops. She knows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because I'd think it too fell a task? You'd be right. She looks at him. Shakes her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's not why. It's because I've never said the words. She looks at Lily playing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not sure I believe it myself. I never felt like a.. (She stops.) Alone in a dark cell. For years. Fighting to cling to memories. What he looked like. Smelled like. The kind man with the big arms and the wonderful smiles.. To me.. he wasn't The King. He was my father. Eric doesn't know what to say. In time, he reaches in his pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've carried it a long time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it made of?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gristle from a stag's heart. (off her look) (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 93b CONTINUED: (3) 93b
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The stag's the most timid animal in the forest but there's a bone in it's heart that gives it courage in it's hour of need and makes it the bravest in of all God's creatures. It's a protection charm. (HE SHRUGS) Or so they say. They share a look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Was it hers? It's the most honest and emotional he's been with her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take it. She does.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, huntsman. He looks at the sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's getting dark. He walks away. (CONTINUED) 53
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: b CONTINUED: (4) 93b
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HUT - FENLAND VILLAGE - NIGHT. 95 Snow White lies in her bed. Nearby sleep Anna and Lily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's so beautiful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That is not a kind thing to say in these times. Youth one cannot alter... beauty, however. We have sacrificed beauty to raise our children in peace. And you, your sacrifice will come, princess. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 95 Snow White looks to Anna, surprised. a95 EXT. OUTSIDE THE HUT - SAME a95 Eric exits and pauses, looks back - through the flap can see Snow White. He walks away. 54
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a OMITTED 95a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 96a OMITTED 96a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: b INT. INSIDE THE HUT - SAME. 96b
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You must prepare yourself, my dear. For a time soon comes when you must deliver that sacrifice. Will you be ready? Anna suddenly stops. As if something has disturbed her. She gets up and leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sleep my dear. You must rest. She leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: c EXT. FENLAND VILLAGE. NIGHT. 96c Eric makes his way along the perimeter, finding a path through the trees. Suddenly he stops. Turns. Twenty feet away. It's Anna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How can you desert her now you know the truth?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aye I know the truth. And that's exactly why she should be as far from me as possible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's the only one that can save us. She needs you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Trust me. I'm the last thing she needs. I'm bad luck. Everything I've ever cared about was destroyed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's good in you Huntsman. I can see it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: People have made that mistake before. He heads off into the night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 97a OMITTED 97a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ANNA'S HUT - FENLAND VILLAGE - NIGHT. 104 Snow White awakens. Looks around, no Eric, puts it in her pocket. Then smells smoke, walks outside and looks up to see -- The sky BLAZES WITH BURNING ARROWS all raining down on the village.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: ARROWS LIGHTING UP THE SKY BEHIND HIM

direction.raw_text: a EXT. WOODS - SAME - NIGHT. 104a Eric, moving away from the village, spins to see the ARROWS LIGHTING UP THE SKY BEHIND HIM. He races toward the village.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: b-107 OMITTED 104b-107
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HUT/ FENLAND VILLAGE - NIGHT. 108 Snow White re-enters the hut just as A FLAMING ARROW pierces through the thatch and sticks next to Lily's sleeping head. Snow White pushes Lily away from the fire and grabs the arrow. Anna SCREAMS because -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: races into the hut. On impulse Snow White backhand STABS HIM in the leg WITH THE FLAMING ARROW and he tumbles, flames burning his clothes. Snow White stares at him for a moment, his face, his pain. Anna shakes her out of the moment and they all race out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FENLAND VILLAGE - NIGHT. 110 Finn and his hunters scour the inferno on their horses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Run, rats, run. Find her! William looks around the burning village in panic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: llla OMITTED llla
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ANNA'S HUT - FENLAND VILLAGE - NIGHT. 112 Snow White runs with Lily and Anna when she sees a FEARSOME MERCENARY leap off his horse and stride towards them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Run! Snow White faces off with the Mercenary. She does as she's been taught - waits for him to approach. When he's close enough to grab her slashes at him with the knife. The huge mercenary knocks her to the ground and advances on her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: when an arrow strikes him in the shoulder. He falls, revealing a young warrior holding a bow. It's WILLIAM. Snow White stares at him through the flames, with a mixture of recognition and uncertainty. It's as if for a moment everything stops as she comes
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With something from the past. Almost like a ghost. Or a vision.. He nods to her in recognition. She stands perfectly still.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna pulls Snow White away, as they move through the smoke and the fire. William starts to follow, a curtain of smoke swirling around him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FENLAND VILLAGE - NIGHT. 113 Eric arrives to see the village in flames. He rushes to the centre of the village, pulling a mercenary off his horse and running him through with his own sword, then fighting and killing TWO MORE MERCS as he makes his way forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: aA
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ANOTHER PART OF FENLAND VILLAGE - NIGHT. 114 Finn sits astride his horse like a demon king in the firelight. He spots William in the distance, searching for Snow White and rides toward him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FENLAND VILLAGE - NIGHT. 115 Snow White looks back through the distant flames as she runs, when suddenly powerful arms grab her. She flails with the knife but it's only Eric -- (CONTINUED) 56
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We must help them! Anna sees Snow White fighting off Eric and shouts -- ANNA You will! Go! Eric holds her firmly, pulling her away against her will.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ANOTHER PART OF FENLAND VILLAGE - NIGHT. 117 William jumps on his horse again, looking for Snow White through the clouds of billowing smoke. Finn and Aldan ride up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you seen her?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, my lord. Finn spits fury and continues to race around, frantic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MARSHES OUTSIDE FENLAND VILLAGE/ LAKE - NIGHT. 118 Eric pulls Snow White onwards, the blazing fires from the village lighting up the marsh. He sees a lake up ahead when a figure appears, blocking their way. It's the giant BROCH. Grinning, he unstraps his huge axe, ready to face Eric one more time. Eric doesn't even slow down, letting go of Snow White and unstrapping his own hatchets. It looks as if it's going to be an epic fight, but as Broch swings, Eric ducks and drives both hatchets into the giant's ribs, killing him instantly. They escape into the darkness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . STAIRWAY - NIGHT. (MOVED FROM 84A) 118B Ravenna walks up the spiral staircase. She passes an old woman who glances at her. She walks past a few steps, thinks she hears a whisper, then turns on a heel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did you say? Then she's right in her face -- RAVENNA WHAT DID YOU SAY! The "old woman" just stares at her, shakes her head. There's something in the woman's eyes that terrifies Ravenna. She backs up, retreating, then scurries away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .ANTE ROOM - ROYAL PALACE - NIGHT (MOVED FROM B4B). 118C Ravenna sits alone, naked. Her spine stretches through her taut skin. In front of her sits the CROWN on a dark cushion, a matted tuft of HAIR caught on the gilded edge. She stares at it, then slowly raises her hand to a bald patch at the side of her hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !!!!!!!!! The word echoes in the palace -- 119 EXT. FENLAND VILLAGE - NIGHT 119 Finn, surrounded by smoke and fire, is beyond frustration. He screams to the heavens in despair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . RIVER BANK - DAY. 121 Eric and Snow White are far down river. They make their way to the bank, drenched and exhausted. Snow White's hands shake - distraught over the violence at the village. Eric looks at her guiltily. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 121 SNOW WHITE Why did you come back?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I led them there. I am to blame. Snow White looks at him with empathy. He's in pain, too. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : (2) 121 ERIC I will take you to Duke Hammond's. Snow White slowly nods. Eric lies back and looks up at the sun flickering through the trees. It dances on his face and then -- A HUGE SHADOW blots out the light. Before he can react, fists and boots lay into him. As he protects his face, we catch glimpses of brutal figures in battle masks. Eric kicks a couple of them away, but more of them swarm over him, pinning him down in leg locks and choke holds. Snow White is treated just as roughly, powerful arms and legs pinning her down. She bites one of her captors and he twists her arms behind her back. A noose is slung around Eric's ankles and he's hauled up - hanging upside down. Snow White, also tied up, sits on the ground beside him. A line of DWARVES stand before them and pull up their grotesque BATTLE MASKS. The dwarf leader, Beith glowers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, well, well... the miscreant huntsman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, Beith! Is this how you treat a friend? The dwarf leader, BEITH, glowers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, you horn beast, this is how I treat a friend! He smacks Eric with a gnarled stick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 124a EXT. WOODS - LATER - DAY. 124a Snow White and the huntsman are still trussed up like chickens now. The dwarves are grouped together, arguing and occasionally throwing angry glances toward Eric. As they bicker the dwarves slap and bite at each other - like animals. (CONTINUED) 59
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a CONTINUED: 124a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did you do to them?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I tried to collect the bounty on their heads. A few times.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is there no one you haven't wronged? Eric nods at her. "You."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But there's always tomorrow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut it, you hedge pig. The Dwarf confab breaks up and they approach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is my lucky day, the puttock I loathe most in the world lands in my lap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is your lucky day, Beith. I've got enough gold to keep you in ale for a year. Cut me down and I'll -- NION, Beith's right hand man and a fervent dwarf supremacist, clips Eric around the ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut your ugly mug, huntsman. You had any pennies they would have fallen out your pockets by now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's hidden. Back there, in the woods. A short distance. They get the reference, don't like it. Nion slaps Eric again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pull the other one, you lying dangler.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell them the truth, huntsman. The youngest of the dwarves, GUS, is beaming at Snow White with his dirty teeth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you looking at? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 124a CONTINUED: (2) 124a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing, Miss. It's just... you been the prettiest thing I ever did seen. He smiles, almost sweetly, disarming her. Snow White looks at her other captors now, noticing a blind dwarf, (MUIR), who sits with his son (QUERT), also gazing at her. (CONTINUED) 60
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a CONTINUED: (3) 124a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just tell me what I've done wrong?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me what you've done right first?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I saved this girl from the Queen. Out of the goodness of my heart. Snow White gives him a look. He calms her with a look of his own.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Doesn't sound like you, huntsman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: People change.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: People, not ruttish swine. Nion gives Eric another smack around the head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Quert? Quert jumps to and helps his father as he makes his way to Snow White. He touches her face and something happens in him. His demeanor softens and the hint of a smile lands on his lips. Meanwhile...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what's the verdict?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leave 'em to rot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Or skewer him and leave her to rot!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That would work, too, but my way's cleaner. Note: Coll and Duir have this "at each other but we're comrades" relationship. Coll also has an incessant cough.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! (a beat for emphasis) She is destined. They all trade looks. Muir is the spiritual leader of the group and they dare not speak against him, even Beith.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Destined?... (CONTINUED) 61
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a CONTINUED: (4) 124a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you hate the Queen?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hate's a strong word. (BEAT) But not strong enough in this case.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My father was King Magnus. This carries weight with the group. Impressed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one listens to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you accompany us to the Duke's castle you will be paid handsomely.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We don't need their help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were already lost seeing that you found us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How handsomely?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your weight in gold. Each of you. The dwarves trade glances, literally sizing each other up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's more than you offered me?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Goodness of your heart, eh, Huntsman?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispers to Coll) I get more than you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: True, but because of your size you eat and drink more, which costs more, so... (CONTINUED) 62
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a CONTINUED: (5) 124a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, we'll take you, but the huntsman can hang -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Both of us. Eric looks surprised by her loyalty. So do the dwarves. Suddenly Duir calls out:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Riders! The dwarves look round to see a DOZEN SILHOUETTED HORSEMEN appear on the crest of a DISTANT HILL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Those are the Queen's men, Beith, better decide quickly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One dwarf's worth a dozen tallsters, I'll take my time thank you -- He suddenly stops as dozens more RIDERS appear on the hill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were saying?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cut him down! MOVE OUT! Nion roughly cuts the line and the Huntsman drops to the ground as Gus gently lifts Snow White. They all hurry down the hill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ROCKY HILL/ CAVE - DAY. 126 The dwarves and their captives arrive at a rocky outcrop. Duir and Coll pull back a large root exposing a cave entrance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, a short cut. All 8 dwarf heads spin at him - pissed off. Enough with the short jokes. Nion raps Eric's knee with the flat of his dagger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Owww!!! Gus cuts Snow White loose. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 126 Nion hesitates, then reluctantly frees the huntsman. DUIR and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: lead the way into a cave. Gus pulls Snow White to safety just as the enemy riders appear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAVE COMPLEX - DAY. 127 From their hidden vantage point, Eric, Snow White, and the dwarves watch the riders searching for them. Some gallop on, but a small troop remain behind. Realizing they have no choice but to retreat further, Duir and Coll signal and the dwarves follow them deeper into the cave system.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAVE - DAY. 128 A shaft of light pours through the cave roof high above, BATS circling. The dwarves move effortlessly down the labyrinth but Snow White and the huntsman have to squeeze through the cracks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SANCTUARY - DAY. 129 Snow White and the huntsman emerge from the cave to see a shimmering landscape of glistening moss and sunlight. It's like a mirage. The air is filled with specks of pollen and a strange
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: echoes like music. For Snow White, it's the most beautiful sound she's ever heard. Next to her, Nion, snorts:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blasted fairy music. Wish I had some wax to stuff my ears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's plenty of moss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: scoops up a handful of moss and moulds himself some ear plugs, sticking them in his ears. Snow White is still mesmerized by the fairy music and the shimmering haze.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is this place? The huntsman looks just as dazzled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They call it Sanctuary, my lady. The Enchanted Forest. It's the home of the fairies. And slowly the hazy curtain gives way to an enchanted forest -- as different to the dark forest as one could imagine -- Life grows everywhere -- LUSH GRASS, PROUD TREES COVERED IN BUTTERFLIES, BUBBLING STREAMS, MOSS COVERED TORTOISES, FOXES AND RABBITS SIDE BY SIDE, EXOTIC FLOWERS AND EVERYWHERE THE LIFE- GIVING POLLEN-- Snow White sees tiny figures flying behind the trees -- almost too fast to spot -- the pollen following them in long trails -- GUS Fairies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pests. Of the other dwarves, only the blind MUIR seems to appreciate the beauty around him, enjoying the vibrations on his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: set up camp.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: -- LUSH GRASS, PROUD TREES COVERED IN BUTTERFLIES, BUBBLING STREAMS, MOSS COVERED TORTOISES, FOXES AND RABBITS SIDE BY SIDE, EXOTIC FLOWERS AND EVERYWHERE THE LIFE- GIVING POLLEN--

direction.raw_text: . STONE RUINS/ GROVE/ ENCHANTED FOREST - SUNSET. 130 HEARTY, SOULFUL SINGING. Seated among the ruins, the dwarves sing a Celtic ballad as old as time, GUS playing the fiddle. Coll and Duir sit away from the others, gazing out with the thousand yard stare of hardened war veterans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That song takes me back to the battle of Tylweth Gate. A small horde versus an army. Pickaxes against swords and spears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Them were the days. (BEAT) What happened to your quailing cough? Coll shakes his head, "dunno". The two of them smile then join in the singing. A drunken GORT takes a swig of ale and staggers over to GUS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Play louder, you whey-face, I can still hear those harpy fairies. He takes another swig and sings at the top of his voice, out of tune, trying to drown out the humming of the unseen fairies. Snow White and the huntsman look on, smiling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Legend has it dwarves were created to uncover all the riches hidden on earth. Not just gold and precious stones, but the beauty in people's hearts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ask me, they've lost the art if they ever had it. When the Queen seized their mines she stole their treasure but more than that she stole their pride. And as if to prove it, GORT and NION sing and share from a flask of rum before they tumble to the ground-near Muir as the song ends. Eric notices the tumble and chuckles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you pribbling at, longshanks?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing half-wit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm half of nothing.you canker blossom. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 130 MUIR Son?... Sing the one. Perched on his stone, QUERT nods; sings a more CHEERFUL SONG. Eric watches as Snow White walks over to Muir. Before she can say anything... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : (2) 130 MUIR That seat's not taken, if that's what you were about to ask. She sits on the log beside him. Gort and Nion eye her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you so much, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's only a log, no need to praise me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. For before. For defending me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your father was a good man. The kingdom prospered. Our people prospered.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There were more of you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aye. And that is all Muir will say on the subject. Gort fills in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One day the group you see before you went down into the mine for a month long shift. Gus was only a boy. When we came back to the surface... nothing. The land was black, everything, everyone... dead, gone. We searched but... Gort surprises himself by choking up a bit. Muir helps out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was the month your father died.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm so sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As am I, princess. As am I.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: walks over to Snow White.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know I'm a bit spongy to look at, Miss, but would you care to dance-with a little 'un?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd be honored. Snow White gets up and dances with Gus as the song picks up. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : (3) 130 Nion and Gort watch her dance with Gus. Nion's not impressed, leans in to Gort...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't trust her. And I don't believe in her, no matter what Muir says. Gort is still melancholy...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just you and me,... do you think there are any of us left? Do you think perhaps they were merely banished?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As long as the Queen's in charge we'll never know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, maybe that's the point, isn't it? (beat; out of the blue) I feel funny. Queer almost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Queer. Since when?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How's your gout? Nion rubs his leg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Better. Gort's look goes from Nion to Snow White.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't think it has anything to do with...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How much have you had to drink?! The huntsman drains the last few drops of his rum when BEITH approaches, sitting beside him gruffly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fleecing us of all our rum, eh huntsman?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you say, we let bygones be bygones?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not yet, nut-hook. What's in it for you? (off Eric's innocent expression) I'm talking about the girl? Is it really just the gold? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : (4) 130 Eric watches Snow White dancing with Gus, then shrugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not sure, Beith. If I had any sense I'd have abandoned her long ago. Beith eyes Eric as he watches Snow White dance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Muir says she's destined. Question is, huntsman, for whom? Gus and Snow White are still dancing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (As Snow White treads on his toes) You don't mind me saying, you got two left feet for a princess.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't mind at all, Gus. I haven't danced in a long, long while. She feels eyes on her - turns to see the huntsman watching her with a slight smile. She smiles back and breaks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you mind, Gus?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not at all. Snow White walks over to the Huntsman, holds out her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've taught me to fight, surely I can teach you to dance. Eric trades a look with Beith, who nudges him on. Eric stands and they proceed to dance, with her teaching.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Palms up, head straight, look me in the eyes. And... The huntsman moves better than you'd imagine. His face even softens as they both enjoy the dance. Beith looks on with a smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a OMITTED 130a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . STONE RUINS/ GROVE/ ENCHANTED FOREST - DAWN. 131 Eric and the dwarves are asleep. Flowers have grown around them, as if they've been asleep for months. Cull and Duir sleep sitting up, back to back, at the ready. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 131 Muir, also awake and smiling, sits against the log, his hand rubbing his son's sleeping head. Snow White sits amazed, drinking in the sights and sounds. Animals emerge from the forest -- SQUIRRELS, BEAVERS, FOXES, BIRDS. Slowly they make their way towards the ruins, gazing at Snow White.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Snow White feels the light on her face and to her surprise, she sees the two MAGPIES who watched over her at the castle. Two
direction.name: direction

result.heading: THE NIGHT SHIMMERS WITH FAIRY LIGHT AS THEY OBSERVE HER
WHERE A DAZZLING LIGHT SHINES THROUGH A TREE

direction.raw_text: slip out of the magpies' bodies, beaming at her. As Snow White sits up, they direct her to the woods WHERE A DAZZLING LIGHT SHINES THROUGH A TREE. As she walks animals fall in alongside her. A little way away, Gus snores in his sleep. The golden light crosses his face and he wakes up. As he opens his eyes, he stares in wonder, then quickly wakes the other dwarves. They all stare in amazement now, even the blind MUIR. Eric is the last to wake up, wondering what the fuss is all about. They rise and follow to -- AT THE TREE She stands BENEATH THE GIANT TREE, facing a MAJESTIC WHITE HART. The air around the mystical creature shimmers with a golden light.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one's ever seen it before. The excited Muir grabs his son Quert by the arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The white hart bows before the princess, father. Sure enough, the HART lowers its head before Snow White. Muir's face is lit up in the golden light, his blind eyes shining.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's blessing her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you talking about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have eyes, huntsman, but do not see. You who have been with her the longest. Eric doesn't understand. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

result.heading: BEAUTIFUL FAIRIES WITH THE DEER EYES

direction.raw_text: She is life itself. She will heal the land. She is the one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you're saying she is destined?... Muir can only shake his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one listens to me. (BEAT) Can't you feel it? Are you ailments not gone? Gold or no gold, where she leads I follow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aye! The other Dwarves trade looks. Nion, the last, shrugs. As Snow White strokes the hart's neck, the golden light brightens, engulfing her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The HART roars in pain and bolts. The fairies and animals scatter in all directions now, their sanctuary violated. Eric looks up to see ALDAN the Yakut emerging through the trees on horseback, notching another arrow to his bow.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: -- SUDDENLY AN ARROW FLIES THROUGH THE AIR -- AND PIERCES THE WHITE HART'S FLANK

direction.raw_text: rips through the sanctuary now, shadows spreading where there was once light. Eric sees FINN appear on horseback, looking like a demon god in the gathering darkness. The huntsman grabs his axe. So do the dwarves, pulling on their battle masks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: emerges through the trees to see ALDAN aiming his bow at Snow White. He rides into the Yakut's horse, knocking him off balance just as he fires -- The arrow narrowly misses Snow White, thudding into a tree. Gus grabs her by the hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on! He runs with her into the forest. Aldan turns on William furiously, drawing his curved sword, but before he can swing the dwarves attack both men -- Eric only has eyes for Finn. They stare at each other in the roaring wind, then Finn gallops into the forest after-Snow White Eric RUNS in the same direction -- (CONTINUED) 70
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: William fends off the furious dwarf attack then rides off in pursuit of snow white -- Aldan sees him but is too busy defending himself against COLL and DUIR to give chase -- 132 EXT. ENCHANTED FOREST - DAY. 132 All around the forest the shadow of death is spreading. Gus runs, dragging Snow White behind him. Galloping through the trees, WILLIAM spots them up ahead, riding faster.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: ANOTHER PART OF THE ENCHANTED FOREST
-- FINN EXPLODES OUT OF THE DARKNESS,

direction.raw_text: . ANOTHER PART OF THE ENCHANTED FOREST - DAY. 133 Bow and arrow at the ready, Eric runs after Finn. All around him the forest is darkening. He follows the sound of galloping hooves when suddenly they stop. He stops too, notching an arrow to his bow, peering into the gloom and listening. There's a tense silence, then SUDDENLY HE HEARS A NOISE. He spins around, ready to fire, when he sees it's only Finn's riderless horse galloping past -- He realizes too late that it's a trick -- FINN EXPLODES OUT OF THE DARKNESS, catching him a glancing blow with his sword -- 134 EXT. STONE RUINS/ GROVE/ ENCHANTED FOREST - DAY. 134 Coll and Duir leap up at Aldan, trying to drag him off his horse, but he's a ferocious fighter, driving them both back -- 135 EXT. ENCHANTED FOREST - DAY. 135 William spots Snow White up ahead. She disappears into the trees and he rides faster. She erupts from behind a branch and pulls him off his horse. Gus races over and raises his axe -- SNOW WHITE Gus, no! Gus's axe stops inches from William's eyes. Snow White recognizes the young warrior, staring at him in surprise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I saw you at the village. William looks up at her, out of breath:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's me. William. Snow White stares in disbelief, tears of surprise welling in her eyes. Gus looks even more confused, lowering his axe. William slowly rises to his feet, gazing back at Snow White, when THEY HEAR A TWIG SNAP -- Gus hears it too, spinning around -- (CONTINUED) 71
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: -- To see ALDAN with an arrow notched to his bow -- GUS PRINCESS! Gus launches himself -- and takes the arrow meant for Snow White. Before Aldan can load another arrow -- William fires an arrow of his own, striking him in the chest. The Yakut topples over, dead at last but still astride his horse. Snow White falls to her knees in anguish, cradling the dying Gus. He smiles weakly, holding her gaze, then whispers:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I shan't leave you, Miss.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: ANOTHER PART OF THE ENCHANTED FOREST

direction.raw_text: . ANOTHER PART OF THE ENCHANTED FOREST - DAY. 136 Eric charges into Finn with a cry of rage. Finn deflects the blow and hurls him back into the trees. Driven by fury, Eric charges again, but Finn uses his anger against him, ducking under the vicious blow and landing a brutal one of his own -- Eric crashes into another tree. His eyes are still full of hatred but his body is weak. Finn smiles in contempt from a few yards away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I captured many girls, but your wife was special.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She fought and then she begged. For her life. Please?!!! You should know she called for you. Your Sara.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you know her name?! Eric is shocked, desperate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She told me. Just before I slit her throat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bastard... .- Eric notices a fallen TREE TRUNK behind Finn -- dead branches
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Finn steps toward him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now you can look for her in the other world and beg for her forgiveness. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 136 Finn smiles and raises his sword for the death blow -- when ERIC LUNGES. He throws himself at Finn, his momentum carrying them both into THE DEAD TREE'S SPIKED BRANCHES -- The branches pierce Finn's body, their tips digging into Eric's flesh. Finn howls in agony -- 137 OMITTED 137 72 138 EXT. ENCHANTED FOREST - DAY. 138 Finn writhes, fighting to pull himself free of the branches but Eric holds him down, even as the spikes dig into him, forcing Finn's wounds to stay open - unable to heal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sister -- heal me!! -- 139 OMITTED 139 140 ENCHANTED FOREST - DAY. 140 -- the SHADOWY ENERGY swirls around Finn's wounds -- but as the branches keep the wounds open, they cannot heal -- 141 INT. THRONE ROOM - DAY. 141 Ravenna sits at her desk - she is small and alone in the vastness of the hall. She stares off into space, a quill in her hand - parchments laid out before her. Then suddenly her body convulses - the bottle of black ink spills - dark tendrils of liquid seep across the papers and onto the floor. RAVENNA Finn ...no! She falls to the floor - writhing. She fights hard at first - but then begins to weaken - her power fades as she ages. Then she stops. RAVENNA Forgive me, brother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 142 Finn gasps as he feels Ravenna cut him off. Reacts in horror and heartbreak as his wounds stop trying to heal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sister... Finn twitches for a moment, looks to Eric.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I feel... Then the light goes out of his eyes. He is finally dead. Slowly, Eric pulls himself free of the branches cutting into his flesh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THRONE ROOM - DAY 143 She has broken their connection. We pull away from her. Ravenna's head is down, depleted, forlorn. Completely still. Ink pools around her bony hands. But when she raises her head -- We see conviction, hatred and determination. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 143 RAVENNA You will pay. You will pay!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ENCHANTED FOREST - DAY. 144 Still bleeding from his wounds, Eric hurries back through the forest until he sees Snow White and the seven dwarves gathered around Gus's body, chanting a low prayer. Eric stares in surprise, then notices William.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who is this? Beith is about to reply when William answers for himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My name is William. I am Duke Hammond's son. (BEAT) You look familiar. Eric dodges a bit with -- ERIC What is the Duke's son doing riding with the Queen's men?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was looking for the princess.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To protect her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The princess is well protected as you can see.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And who are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The man who got her this far your lordship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm grateful for your help but I will take her from here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll have to wait for your voice to break before you give me orders - William draws his sword in indignation and Eric draws his axe. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 144 ERIC Anyone can draw steel, boy. It takes a man to use it. William is about to react when Snow White turns...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leave him, huntsman. He's our friend. He glares but his eyes glisten with tears. Snow White is still bowed over Gus's body, sobbing, mourning. The prayer chant ends. Nion spits with anger and walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We need to convene. They all follow him a few steps away, where they have privacy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it, Nion?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is what happens when dwarves mix with men. We always come out worse. We have big hearts and we'll fight for any cause -- but for what? For some new Queen to call us runts and turn us out of our homes again?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've nothing against the girl, but I'm not willing to risk my life for her either, like poor Gus. Beith considers quietly, the other dwarves listening too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispers to Coll) Does this mean we're not fighting the Queen?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not sure yet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about the gold he promised us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What use is gold if you're dangling by your bony neck, you jackdaw?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aye, the Queen will flay us alive for helping her! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : (2) 144 MUIR The White Hart blessed the girl. Nion shakes his head and rolls his eyes, but Beith listens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Even our own legends speak of the redeemer who will heal the land.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That little mutton?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All the lions and wolves in the kingdom have tried to defeat the Queen and failed. Why not a mutton? The dwarves stare at him incredulously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gus lost his life because of her!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. He gave his life for her. As will I if necessary. Look at us. Look at what we've become. They trade looks. They know where he's going with this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We were once proud, now we pilfer and drink and dream of when we didn't. I am willing to die for a chance at becoming the man I once was. And that is the last word. Quert puts his arm around his father and kisses his forehead. Beith and Gort trade a nod and a smile.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: THE BRIGHT COLORS OF THE ENCHANTED FOREST HAVE FADED

direction.raw_text: . STONE RUINS/ GROVE/ ENCHANTED FOREST - DAY. 145 QUERT sings a CELTIC MELODY OF LOSS as Gus is laid out on a funeral pyre. All around him, THE BRIGHT COLORS OF THE ENCHANTED FOREST HAVE FADED and there are no animals and fairies to be seen. It's as if Ravenna's shadow has passed here too. The tough, battle hardened dwarves shed tears like children. Snow White looks heartbroken as Beith lights the pyre. As the flames rise, a HAUNTING LAMENT carries us into the next scene --- 146 OMITTED 146 76 147 EXT. HILLS - DAY. 147 Quert's SONG CONTINUES as the group make their way across the barren hills and into the mountains -- 148 EXT. HIGHLAND HILLS - DAY. 148 William walks alongside Snow White, glancing at her tentatively. He waits until the others are out of earshot.

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry I left you. She looks over and sees the remorse in his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You didn't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I'd known you were alive I would have come sooner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We were children, William. You're here now. They reach some steep rocks and Eric turns around, offering Snow White his hand. She takes it and he helps her up the slope. William looks on, feeling jealous. Beith follows Duir and Coll up to the summit of the hill, then looks at the surrounding peaks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll rest the night at the top of this hill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a INT. MIRROR CHAMBER - ROYAL PALACE - DAY. 148a From above - Ravenna stands in the center of the room, surrounded by ravens. She raises her arms and they take flight, circling above her. She lowers her arms and their swirling pattern lowers, until she is completely surrounded by them - a tornado of ravens. She has become them, and they her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAMP SITE/ MOUNTAINS - NIGHT. 149 A FIRE CRACKLES. The dwarves have set up camp. Coll and Duir sit on a rocky outcrop, Coll braiding Duir's hair while Duir sharpens his axe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's not how you sharpen an axe. You sharpen downward. Not upward.. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 149 DUIR My father taught me how to sharpen an axe. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : (2) 149 COLL Well he taught you wrong. He raises the axe, only half in jest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want to test it? William watches Snow White warming herself by the fire, then heads over to Eric, who is also keeping watch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not my place to give you orders. I misjudged you. Eric looks up. He shakes William's hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I you. William looks over to where Snow White is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We shared a childhood together, before she was taken away. She hasn't changed. She has that same light inside her. Surely you can see it.. Eric looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'd be blind not to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If we can just get her to the castle, the people.. The people will see it. She's our only hope, Huntsman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll get her to the castle. Don't worry about that..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've thought about her constantly. Every time I closed my eyes. I can hardly believe I've found her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You should tell her. She'd appreciate it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm afraid to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not telling someone how you feel and living with the regret is a lot worse. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : (3) 149 150 OMITTED 150 150a EXT. MOUNTAINS - DAWN. 150a Snow White sits on a rock, away from the camp, reflecting quietly. She stares out at the surrounding mountains and valleys when she suddenly senses a presence behind her. She turns in alarm
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: but it's only William. William smiles back gently and whispers...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Walk with me. They walk into the silver birches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Up here it's as if nothing's changed. The world looks beautiful again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It will be. When you are Queen. Snow White turns, surprised by his words.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The people of this kingdom hate Ravenna with their very fiber.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's strange, but... I feel only sorrow for her. William is taken aback by this but pushes on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Once people find out you're alive they will rise up in your name. Snow White stares back at him uncertainly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It takes more than a name. I an not my father, William.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are his daughter. And rightful heir. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 150a CONTINUED: 150a He steps closer, gazing into her eyes devotedly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I had a choice, I would take you far from here. And keep you safe by my side. But I have a duty. And so do you. They hold each other's gaze, Snow White still ridden with doubt. (CONTINUED) 79
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a CONTINUED: (2) 150a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do I inspire? How do I lead men?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The same way you led me when we were children. I followed you everywhere. Ran when you called. I would have done anything for you. She looks touched by his words, smiling softly, trying to make light of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's not how I remember it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No... They gaze into each other's eyes, close enough to kiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I remember we were always arguing. And fighting. And... She trails off, lost in his gaze. He stops, leans closer and kisses her gently. They stay like that a moment, then William pulls away, holding something in his hand. Snow White smiles as she sees that it's an APPLE. With a mischievous smile, William holds out the apple for Snow White, just like he did when they were children.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I remember this trick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (With mock innocence) What trick? Snow White holds his gaze, then snatches the apple from him before he can take a bite, raising it to her lips with a smile. As she bites -- 150b OMITTED 150b
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: c OMITTED 150c
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: d EXT. CAMP SITE/ MOUNTAINS - DAWN. 150d. Eric, startled,- awakens. 80
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: e EXT. MOUNTAINS - DAWN. 150e As Snow White chews, a flicker of a smile crosses William's face. Snow White stares curiously, then suddenly gasps, struggling to breathe -- 150f EXT. CAMP SITE/ MOUNTAINS - DAWN. 150f Eric stands up, looks around, dwarves still asleep. He shakes William, who wakes at the ready. They walk into the trees and follow -- A SINGLE SET OF TRACKS.
